CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Proposal/Price Quote") , "5 Negotiation", CASE(TEXT(StageName), "Qualification","1 Early Stage", "Needs Analysis","1 Early Stage", "Value Proposition","2 Qualification Stage", "Proposal/Price Quote","3 Advanced Stage", "Negotiation/Review"," Won", "Closed Lost","0 Lost", "N/A") )
CustomField.label: Stage Code
